quotes.text: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success starts with self-discipline.
quotes.author: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson

quotes.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: It never gets easier, you just get stronger.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun

quotes.text: If it doesn't challenge you, it won't change you.
quotes.author: Fred DeVito

quotes.text: Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
quotes.author: Jerry Dunn

quotes.text: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Your body can stand almost anything. It's your mind you have to convince.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Small progress is still progress.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Good things come to those who sweat.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sore today, strong tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.text: Success is usually the culmination of controlling failure.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.text: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.text: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.text: Excellence is not a singular act but a habit. You are what you repeatedly do.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.text: Success is not for the chosen few but for the few who choose.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Once you see results, it becomes an addiction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: You don't have to be extreme, just consistent.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.text: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
quotes.author: Satya Nani

quotes.text: Fall in love with the process and the results will come.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The difference between try and triumph is a little umph.
quotes.author: Marvin Phillips

quotes.text: What seems impossible today will one day become your warm-up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You are one workout away from a good mood.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: Be stronger than your excuses.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Sweat is fat crying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: If you think lifting is dangerous, try being weak.
quotes.author: Paul Coach Carter

quotes.text: Fitness is like a relationship. You can't cheat and expect it to work.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Don't wish for it. Work for it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Strive for progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.text: A champion is someone who gets up when they can't.
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.text: You are your only limit.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Hustle for that muscle.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dreams don't work unless you do.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Champions train, losers complain.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's supposed to be hard. If it were easy, everyone would do it.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dugan

quotes.text: If something stands between you and your success, move it.
quotes.author: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson

quotes.text: The clock is ticking. Are you becoming the person you want to be?
quotes.author: Greg Plitt

quotes.text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.text: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.text: Success at anything will always come down to focus and effort.
quotes.author: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson

quotes.text: There is no substitute for work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The pain of discipline is far less than the pain of regret.
quotes.author: Sarah Bombell

quotes.text: Champions are made from something they have deep inside them.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Your health account, your bank account, they're the same. The more you put in, the more you can take out.
quotes.author: Jack LaLanne

quotes.text: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency.
quotes.author: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson

quotes.text: When you have a clear vision of your goal, it's easier to take the first step.
quotes.author: LL Cool J

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Intensity builds immensity.
quotes.author: Kevin Levrone

quotes.text: The resistance you fight physically will build your character.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: No matter how slow you go, you are still lapping everybody on the couch.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Discipline equals freedom.
quotes.author: Jocko Willink

quotes.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Success requires replacement of vague wishes with vivid dreams.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: What hurts today makes you stronger tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jay Cutler

quotes.text: Confidence comes from hours and days and weeks and years of constant work and dedication.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Strong people are harder to kill and more useful in general.
quotes.author: Mark Rippetoe

quotes.text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Your success is found in your daily routine.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Work hard in silence, let success be your noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.text: Today is another chance to get better.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's a slow process, but quitting won't speed it up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Your body hears everything your mind says.
quotes.author: Naomi Judd

quotes.text: Success is 10% inspiration and 90% perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Make your workouts your best meetings of the day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Be the hardest worker in the room.
quotes.author: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson

quotes.text: Fitness is not about being better than someone else, it's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

quotes.text: What you lack in talent can be made up with desire and hustle.
quotes.author: Don Zimmer

quotes.text: Consistency is what turns average into excellence.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Show up, even when you don't want to.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Train hard, stay humble.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: There is no finish line.
quotes.author: Nike

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Your body hears 'I can't' and shuts down. Tell it 'I can.'
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.text: Repetition is the mother of skill.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Courage is taking those first steps to your dream even if you can’t see the path ahead.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.text: Sweat, smile, and repeat.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is little more than dedication to the things others are afraid to do.
quotes.author: Cory Gregory

quotes.text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Those who think they have not time for bodily exercise will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
quotes.author: Edward Stanley

quotes.text: The real workout starts when you want to stop.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.text: Strength grows in the moments when you think you can’t go on but you keep going anyway.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.text: The human body is the best work of art.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The real workout starts when you want to stop.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: When you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for motivation. Get disciplined.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Leave your excuses at the door.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Exercise should be regarded as a celebration of what your body can do, not a punishment.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Better sore tomorrow than sorry forever.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Say something positive about yourself. No matter how absurd it sounds.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.text: The fitness journey is never complete.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Exercise is the best way to earn your body's gratitude.
quotes.author: Tae Bo

quotes.text: Training insane or remaining the same.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If you still look cute at the end of your workout, you didn't train hard enough.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every day is a chance to become better.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A champion is simply a person who did not give up when they wanted to.
quotes.author: Fred Shero

quotes.text: The body never lies.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.text: Exercise is the playground of endorphins.
quotes.author: Pam Trunzo

quotes.text: Work hard, stay humble.
quotes.author: Peter Mwathi

quotes.text: Invest in your body, it's the only one you've got.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.text: You have to push past your perceived limitations, push past that point you thought was as far as you can go.
quotes.author: David Goggins

quotes.text: Exercise is like telling your body, 'You're a beast! Let's go for it!'
quotes.author: Pam Trunzo

quotes.text: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Health is like money; we never have a true idea of its value until we lose it.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.text: The only machine I'm attached to is the one I go to the gym on.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: We all get the same 24 hours. It's up to you to decide how to use them.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.text: You have to think it before you can do it. The mind is what makes it all possible.
quotes.author: Kai Greene

quotes.text: Your body is a machine. Give it the right fuel to get the job done.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
quotes.author: Estee Lauder

quotes.text: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.text: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow.
quotes.author: Ed Coan

quotes.text: What seems impossible today will someday become your warm-up.
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.text: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Motivation is crap. Motivation comes and goes. When you're driven, whatever is in front of you will get destroyed.
quotes.author: Dr. Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Strength doesn't lie in numbers. It lies in your dedication.
quotes.author: Maxine Ashley

quotes.text: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: You didn't come this far, to only come this far.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Stop quitting on your quit.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: Suffering is the biggest motivation in the world.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.text: It's always further than it looks. It's always taller than it looks. And it's always harder than it looks.
quotes.author: The 300 Workout

quotes.text: Train hard, stay hungry, be humble.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If you can't outwork them, outwork yourself.
quotes.author: Ali Lorestani

quotes.text: Dying is one of the few things that can be practiced without risk.
quotes.author: Terry Bravant

quotes.text: You don't drown by falling in the water; you drown by staying there.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: What seems nasty, painful, and unpleasant – that's what works.
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.text: Once you see results, it becomes an addiction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Soreness is the new strength.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Muscles are paid with sweat.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not addicted to lifting weights; we're just in a really committed relationship.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My fit-bit thinks I'm a really bad jogger, but I'm actually just a really good walker.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.text: My biggest fear at the gym is getting trapped under the weights and having to gnaw off my own arm to survive.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I don't mind sweating the small things; it's gotta happen when you're working on getting swole.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only running I do is from the fridge to the couch and back again.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Lifting weights doesn't make you heavy-set; it makes you muscle-bound and ready to rebound.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I thought I'd feel better about myself if I went to the gym, but then I didn't. And I still don't.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.text: When I go to the gym, I lift things up and put them down again. I don't even know what I'm training for.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.text: Going to the gym is like going to the circus, minus the fun.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not saying I'm Batman, but have you ever seen me and Batman in the same room together?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not sweating, I'm leaking awesomeness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My sweat is liquid awesomeness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I don't work out. I participate in extreme body motivational activities.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Running is the lazy way to exercise. I prefer to lift heavy things.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My muscles are so strong that my body has turned into a weapon of mass construction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I don't run. I take life at a brisk canter.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not getting fitter, I'm just becoming harder to kidnap.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My gym routine is like a fairy tale – it's never-ending, and it's a nightmare.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not sweating, I'm just attempting to become a water feature.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I don't need a personal trainer, I have a mirror.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My new year's resolution is to put enough weight on this year so I can lose it next year.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Working out is modern courting. If you listen to terrible pop music, can't breathe, and feel violated, you're doing it right.
quotes.author: Amy Summers

quotes.text: I'm so prepared for this workout. I paid for my gym membership for the month.
quotes.author: Nia Hill

quotes.text: I want to be that person that can actually feel guilty for not going to the gym.
quotes.author: J.P. Sears

quotes.text: The best workout is the one you haven't done yet.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I don't have a six-pack, I have a party ball.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Exercising to stay fit is like taking a shower before going to a mud bath.
quotes.author: Amish Proverb

quotes.text: I'm lazy, but I am achieving something by being lazy and keeping everyone's expectations nice and low.
quotes.author: Miranda Hart

quotes.text: The only weight I lift is my hopes and dreams.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Exercise? I thought you said 'extra fries'!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not lifting weights; I'm just picking things up and putting them down repeatedly.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I don't need a six-pack, I have a keg.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: My workout plan: Step 1: Don't work out. Step 2: Repeat step 1.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not out of shape, I'm just in a different shape.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not lazy; I'm just in energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Grind hard, shine harder.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat is just liquid awesomeness.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat is the sauce of success.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Earn your body, don't inherit it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Grind now, shine later.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat is the perfume of effort.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat is the currency of champions.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Grind like no one else, shine like no one else.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Exercise is the best way to earn your body's gratitude.
quotes.author: Tae Bo

quotes.text: The first wealth is health.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Fitness is not a destination, it's a way of life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat is just fat crying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Suck it up and go to the gym.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: An hour at the gym walks off my mouth.
quotes.author: Emily Banks

quotes.text: Let the burn be your desire.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: No pain, no gain. Shovel trucks full of that pain.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat like a pig to look like a fox.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Earn your body, don't inherit it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat is the perfume of effort.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Exercise is a celebration of what your body can do, not a punishment for what you ate.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Exercising will never be vain if it makes you feel better.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.text: Feeling strong is the new looking skinny.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.text: Fitness is like a relationship. You can't cheat and expect it to work.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Fitness is not about being better than someone else, it's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Get comfortable with being uncomfortable!
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.text: Growth begins when you start to end your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.text: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: I don't count my sit-ups; I only start counting when it starts hurting because they're the only ones that count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: I have to exercise early in the morning before my brain figures out what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Marsha Doble

quotes.text: I'll do whatever it takes to win games, whether it's sitting on a bench waving a towel, handing a cup of water to a teammate, or hitting the game-winning shot.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.text: If it doesn't challenge you, it won't change you.
quotes.author: Fred DeVito

quotes.text: If it were easy, everybody would do it. It's the hard that makes it great.
quotes.author: Tom Hanks

quotes.text: If you don't take care of your body, where are you going to live?
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: If you get tired, learn to rest, not quit.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.text: If you keep pushing forward, eventually you will overcome any resistance.
quotes.author: Rupal Asodaria

quotes.text: In any given moment, we have two options: to step forward into growth or to step back into safety.
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.text: In the universe, there is an immeasurable, indescribable force which shamans call intent, and absolutely everything that exists in the entire cosmos is connected to intent.
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.text: Inspiration usually comes during work, rather than before it.
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.text: It doesn't matter how many times you get knocked down. All that matters is you get up one more time than you were knocked down.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: It doesn't matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: It hurts now, but one day it will be your warm-up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's not the torture, it's the will to continue that makes the difference in the end.
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.text: It's not about having time, it's about making time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's not always easy, but it's always worth it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.text: Live with passion, fear not the haters.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Losers quit when they're tired. Winners quit when they've won.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Never say the sky's the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: No better way to start the day than with a sweat.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: No excuses, just results.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: No one is to blame for your future situation but yourself. Therefore, it is better to start doing something now.
quotes.author: Jitti Ariya

quotes.text: Nothing can substitute for just plain hard work.
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: One day, you won't be able to do this. Today is not that day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Our bodies are our gardens, to which our wills are gardeners.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.text: Performance is hugely improved regardless of the task when you start enjoying it.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.text: Perseverance is stubbornness with a purpose.
quotes.author: Josh Shipp

quotes.text: Progress is rarely a straight line. There are always zigs and zags.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Putting in that extra effort today keeps the dream alive for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Push harder than yesterday if you want a different tomorrow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, intelligent direction, and skillful execution.
quotes.author: Willa A. Foster

quotes.text: Relax, you're doing much better than you think you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Respect your body. It's the only one you get.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Set small goals and build upon them.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.text: Someday you will thank yourself for never giving up.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Start by doing what's necessary, then do what's possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi

quotes.text: Stay humble, work hard, be kind.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Strength doesn't come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn't.
quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

quotes.text: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing.
quotes.author: Pelé

quotes.text: Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind braces up, snow is exhilarating; there is no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.text: Sweat is fat crying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: The day you plant the seed is not the day you eat the fruit.
quotes.author: Fabienne Fredrickson

quotes.text: The dream is free, but the hustle is sold separately.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The mind is the most important part of achieving any fitness goal. Mental change always comes before physical change.
quotes.author: Matt McGorry

quotes.text: The struggle itself towards the heights is enough to fill a man's heart.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: There are all kinds of different exercises, but the most important exercise is the walk you take from your front door to the gym.
quotes.author: Alex Petit

quotes.text: There are no shortcuts to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.text: The body achieves what the mind believes.
quotes.author: Jim Evans

quotes.text: The hardest lift of all is lifting your butt off the couch.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life it gives me.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Cooper

quotes.text: The wall is there to stop the people who don't want it badly enough.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.text: Training is the word we use now. To me, it's practice for life.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.text: Wake up with determination, go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Weight training is a waste of time for bodybuilders. Boxing is the way to go.
quotes.author: Salman Khan

quotes.text: When you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for motivation. Get disciplined.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat is just fat crying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Muscles are paid with sweat.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: An hour at the gym walks off my mouth.
quotes.author: Emily Banks

quotes.text: Soreness is the new strength.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sweat a lot, regret nothing.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Train like a beast to look like a beauty.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every next level of your life will demand a different you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Good things come to those who sweat.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You're just one workout away from a good mood.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't sacrifice the thing you want most for something you want now.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.text: My body keeps an accurate journal regardless of what I write down.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
quotes.author: Dr. Robert Schuller

quotes.text: Hustle for that muscle.
quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

quotes.text: Pain is weakness leaving the body.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A one-hour workout is just 4% of your day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: No pain, no gain. Shut up and train.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You didn't come this far to only come this far.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Every next level of your life will demand a different you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The last three reps are what makes the muscle grow.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Don't stop until you're proud.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I don't sweat, I sparkle like a vampire in the sun.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I'm not fat, I'm just easier to see.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: I don't need to work out; I get enough exercise from jumping to conclusions.
quotes.author: Unknown
